
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
# define sz(a) int((a).size())
# define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end() 
# define allr(c) (c).rbegin(),(c).rend() 

using namespace std;

typedef long long int lli;

lli fib[89];

int main() {
    fib[1] = 1;
    fib[2] = 1;
    for (int i = 3; i <= 88; ++i) {
        fib[i] = fib[i - 1] + fib[i - 2];
    }
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            char c = 'A' + ((fib[i] - 1) % 26);
            cout << c;
        }
        cout << '\n';
    }
}
